text: Ritthem is a village in the Dutch province of Zeeland. It is located in the municipality of Vlissingen, about 4 kilometres east of the city. Ritthem was a separate municipality until 1966, when it was merged with Vlissingen. ==References== ==External links== * Map of the former municipality, around 1868. Category:Populated places in Zeeland Category:Former municipalities of Zeeland Category:Vlissingen
title: Ritthem
